name: Bird Dog Chase Simulator
description:
The ducks will never see him coming. Play Bird Dog Simulator

This bird dog loves to hunt down owls, eagles, ducks, storks, and any other flying animals he can chase down. Thrive and survive in these wild jungle conditions. Be careful, you are not the only canine around. Compete against other wild animals in this fast action dog simulator. The game is all about survival of the fittest. Help him improve his hunting skills. The more you hunt, the more meat points you earn. You can use these points to upgrade your hunting skills. Search and hunt in every corner of this large open world.

5 BIRDS INCLUDED
Stork, Duck, Sea Gull, Owl, and Eagle
4 OTHER ENEMY ANIMALS
Deer, Wild Pig, Crocodile, and Greyhound
CHANGING WEATHER CONDITIONS
These stray dogs don't like the rain. But the jungle gets wet!
HEAD TO HEAD BATTLES
The sim includes 6 head to head battle match ups. Its a flight for survival. Remember, there is no second place in nature.
HD GRAPHICS IN 3D
Stunning High Definition graphics really brings this jungle to life.
COOL SOUND EFFECTS
Plenty of dog barking and other wild animal sounds!
UPGRADE YOUR DOGGY
When you hunt, you earn meat units that can be used to purchase upgrades for your big kitten.
ACTION PACKED GAMEPLAY
Addictive game play and fun controls for hours of great animal simulation.
TRACK YOUR HUNTING AUTOMATICALLY
The game keeps a record all your victories so you can see how many birds and animals you have taken down.

Top Sim Features:
--Race across this Huge Open World 3D Jungle Map
--12 Adventures Included to earn Bonus points
--9 Wild Animals to compete with
--Features 6 Head to Head Battles
--4 Different Times of Day, including a rain storm
--Upgrade your Cat's Stamina, Speed and Strength
--Multiple Camera Angles

When creating the Dog simulator app, tried to keep all ages in mind. We are working on creating a new multiplayer version so you will be able to challenge your friends.
